name: NSCollectionLayoutGroupCustomItem
desc: An item used in a group with a custom layout arrangement.

items.name: init(frame: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a custom item with the specified frame.

items.name: init(frame: CGRect, zIndex: Int)
items.desc: Creates a custom item with the specified frame and vertical stacking order in relation to other items in the group.

items.name: var frame: CGRect
items.desc: The frame of the custom item.

items.name: var zIndex: Int
items.desc: The vertical stacking order of the custom item in relation to other items in the group.
